name: TossBoss
description: Professional valet trash collection service for multi-family residential properties. Uniformed valets collect bagged trash from residents' doorsteps and transport to on-site dumpsters nightly.
targetMarket: Multi-family residential properties (apartment complexes, condos) with 50-500+ units in North Georgia
corePromise: Increase NOI and resident satisfaction. $10-20 net profit per unit monthly. #1 amenity residents want.
